body_html: @goodfeli As far as I understand, one needs to split up the input variable into 'batch_size' number of tensors. However, one would need to know the batch_size (as an integer) a priori when constructing this using tf.split. Is there an easy way to use your pseudocode since we usually dont have the batch_size a priori?
